summary: Completed testing of eFunnels Course & Membership Platform Phase 7. Backend APIs are mostly functional (76.7% success rate) with some minor issues. Frontend testing was limited due to browser automation tool configuration issues, but manual verification shows the React app is loading correctly.

flaky_endpoints.issue: GET method returns 405 Method Not Allowed
flaky_endpoints.impact: Cannot retrieve course modules via API

flaky_endpoints.issue: GET method returns 405 Method Not Allowed
flaky_endpoints.impact: Cannot retrieve module lessons via API

flaky_endpoints.issue: Requires student_name and student_email fields not documented in frontend
Returns 'Enrollment not found' even after successful enrollment
Requires request body but none specified in API
Returns 404 Not Found for valid course IDs

integration_issues.issue: Browser automation tool navigating to backend URL instead of frontend URL
integration_issues.fix_priority: LOW - Testing infrastructure issue, not app issue

passed_tests: Course lesson creation (text, video, quiz types)

success_percentage.frontend: Limited testing due to automation tool issues, but manual verification shows app loads correctly

high_priority: Fix course enrollment API to match frontend expectations (remove student_name/student_email requirements or update frontend)
Fix course progress tracking - enrollment not being recognized after successful enrollment
Fix lesson completion API - clarify required request body format
Add missing GET endpoints for course modules and lessons
medium_priority: Add proper API documentation for all course-related endpoints
low_priority: Investigate browser automation tool URL configuration for future testing
